A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really\, really wanted to like this movie. Really. I’ve seen it twice now\, and I disliked the parts I wasn’t happy with even more\, and liked the few well filmed scenes\, more. Gave this 3 stars only for the effects and a certain lightsaber fight scene\, plot was barely 2 stars. Disney has made this film childish (same kind of nonsense like in Guardians 2)\, forced characters that didn’t add any true benefit to the story\, committed so many movie sins that they only got away with because it’s Star Wars\, and made all the characters seem like shells. Disney owning everything\, sadly\, seems to be killing true creativity\, and making them a ton of money. Again\, for a mindless movie experience\, it’s pretty on the surface\, but it doesn’t go much beyond that.
